BIO

I have just finished a front-end developer online course at Pixellab and now I feel more than ready to dive into this field and give it my all to become better as a front-end developer. I have studied the basics of HTML, CSS and JavaScript and what I need now is the real-world experience in coding, that this internship will provide. I have also started another course in learning React which will help me grow more as a developer.

Currently, I am working in an unrelated field which leans strongly on soft skills, sure to come in handy in all types of work. These include transferrable skills such as engaging easily with people from different backgrounds, working in a diverse team, and a great deal of patience under pressure.

I want to enter an internship in fron-end development because it would offer me the opportunity to gain practical skills in the field. I'm eager to apply the theories studied at the course, and to work alongside professionals in the domain, learning more about the business along the way.

I would appreciate an opportunity to talk further about my application, and am easiest to reach via email or phone. Thank you in advance for reviewing my application and considering how I might contribute to your team.
